title: Cover a Protest
description: A reporter is sent to cover a protest. They need to report on the size of the crowd, their message, and any interactions with counter-protesters or police.

tasks.description: Interview protesters to understand their motivations and goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers quotes that represent the protesters' point of view.

tasks.description: Interview police or event organizers to get official estimates of the crowd size.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets an official crowd estimate to balance protester claims.

tasks.description: Observe and document the overall atmosphere of the protest (e.g., peaceful, tense) and any notable incidents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent captures the qualitative feel of the event.

tasks.description: Write a balanced article that includes the perspectives of the protesters and officials, and accurately describes the events.
tasks.expected_outcome: A fair and comprehensive article is produced.
